data.event: Based on testimony of Charlie Birger himself, the Shelton Brothers were convicted for a 1925 unsolved mail carrier robbery of $15,000 and were sentenced to 25 years.
Based on testimony of Charlie Birger himself, the Shelton Brothers were convicted for a 1925 unsolved mail carrier robbery of $15,000 and were sentenced to 25 years.

event.title: were released a few years later

data.event: They were released a few years later.

event.title: the murder of West City Mayor Joe Adams in 1928
